ul.li: Added ability to export history data as JSON file recognizable by the app
"Save request dialog" will open only once pressing CTRL+S couple of times.
Fixed Issue 174: If-Modified-Since format now follow RFC.
Fixed Issue 177: New Feature Request for improved linkifying to suit Django + TastyPie.
Fixed Issue 155: Default "Content-Type" header can't be saved
Changed JSON response view
Added hide option for response headers.
Added options menu for URL panel (hover URL and then setting icon).
Fixed Issue 137: Escaping ⟨ ⟩ in header response.
Link to "open in JSON tab" is now always visible in "Parsed" tab.
Fixed issue with handling error during app definition download.
Added support for networks where contact to app server is impossible.
Fixed Haved and History view when there is no items.
Fixed Issue 129: Allow deletion and renaming of projects
Fixed Issue 121: Project are not exporting
Fixed Issue 132: User-Agent changes persists. (Chrome >= beta)
Header of the request view now include a request name (if any).
Fixed Issue 129: Combobox to select requests in project always selects the first item
Fixed Issue 128: Mutlipart Boundary not sent in request body when file is not attach using mutlipart/form-data
Fixed Issue 117: How do you delete a project ?
When multipart/form-data is selected as a content-type the app will parse payload data from the form tab in proper way (including boundary section)

When response content-type header is javascript you will be able to open result in JSON tab (link on the top of the "parsed" tab). Facebook API do not set right JSON header and response is parsed as a JavaScript.
Fixed Issue 100: XML is not shown for application/atom+xml content-type
Removed all CSS declaration to external CSS file.
Projects menu now contain "select" input instead of several block elements with name.
Several bug fixes
Fixed Issue 85: POST request failed
Fixed Issue 87: BUG Save
Fixed Issue 91: Auto-complete prevents entering different URI
Added Magic Variables feature (more info)
Added qearch to the saved requests ad history view
Added delete history entry button to the history view
Some changes in core data layer
Compiled with a latest stable GWT version (2.5.0)
New UI
Migration to GWT 2.5 RC
Migration to extensions manifest version 2
Optimized XML nad JSON view renderer using web workers and optymizing regular expressions
Added save to file and "copy" function to response view.
Deprecated server import/export
Added file export and import
Implemented new Chrome APIs: webRequest, declarativeWebRequest and storage
Move part of request functionality to the bacground page to set declarativeWebRequest filter before request
Integration with other extensions providing API to set request data in application via extensions passage massing or via web intents
Now background page removes almost all default browser's headers not set by user.
Database structure and local storage keys has changed.
Links in response view now changing URL value in request view.
Added chrome.synch API to synch user settings (Issue 76)
Fixed Issue 57: Application have new "save request" system. User can link requests into project and switch between overwriting selected data.
Fixed Issue 62: Now application can set all request headers (even prohibited by XMLHttpRequest spec)
Fixed Issue 67: Application now can show redirect information.
Fixed Issue 68: Payload is set in request when using custom "method"
Fixed Issue 70 and Issue 73: Application now wil not set Content-Type header fon non-payload requests
